amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the investment of funds as called for in the Depot Maintenance Strategy and Master Plan of the Air Force.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1516 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1516 proposed by Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S8778-8790; text: CR S8779) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the investment of funds as called for in the Depot Maintenance Strategy and Master Plan of the Air Force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1516 proposed by Senator Hatch.
